summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating a desire to meet or speak. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests that the communication may be privileged. It highlights the personal nature of the correspondence between Epstein and Staley.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating he is available to meet or speak until 2 PM on the day of the email.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

connections.description: Epstein reaches out to Staley to arrange a meeting or conversation, indicating a personal or professional connection.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein expresses his availability to meet or speak until 2 PM.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email suggests a personal or professional relationship between Epstein and Staley.
